sources.title: The Old Oaken Bucket (1941)
sources.description: A frog boy calls on his froggette sweetheart, who lives in a well with a bucket for a lift. He can't escape her family so, to be alone, they visit a fair and partake in the rides and food. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-old-oaken-bucket-1941/

metadata.Plot: A frog boy calls on his froggette sweetheart, who lives in a well with a bucket for a lift. He can't escape her family so, to be alone, they visit a fair and partake in the rides and food.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Donald McKee
